name: @gestell/mcp
description: Gestell MCP server exposing Prompt, Query, Collection, Document, Table and Feature tools

http.description: HTTP endpoint for remote MCP tool calls

environment.name: GESTELL_API_KEY
environment.description: API key for authenticating with Gestell services

environment.name: GESTELL_MCP_SERVICE_TYPE
environment.description: Type of service to run (TERMINAL, HTTP, etc.)

environment.name: GESTELL_MCP_PORT
environment.description: Port to run the MCP server on

environment.name: GESTELL_MCP_HOST
environment.description: Host to bind the MCP server to

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Run a single prompt against a Collection and stream the response.

query.title: Search Query
query.description: Perform a reason based search over a Collection.

collection.get.title: Get Collection
collection.get.description: Retrieves a collection from the Gestell Platform by its ID

collection.list.title: List Collections
collection.list.description: Lists collections in the Gestell Platform

collection.create.title: Create Collection
collection.create.description: Creates a new collection with the specified metadata, including name, type, and optional PII controls. Collections organize documents and define how they should be processed and queried.

collection.update.title: Update Collection
collection.update.description: Updates a collection in the Gestell Platform

document.get.title: Get Document
document.get.description: Retrieves a document from a collection by its ID.

document.create.title: Upload and Create a Document
document.create.description: Uploads a document to a collection and creates it.

document.update.title: Update Document
document.update.description: Updates a document in a collection

document.delete.title: Delete Document
document.delete.description: Deletes a document from a collection

document.reprocess.title: Reprocess Document
document.reprocess.description: Reprocesses a document in a collection

document.export.title: Export Document
document.export.description: Exports a document from a collection to json layout or text

table.query.title: Query Table
table.query.description: Queries a table from a category in a collection

table.export.title: Export Table
table.export.description: Exports a table from a category in a collection to json or csv

feature.query.title: Query Features
feature.query.description: Queries features from a category in a collection

feature.export.title: Export Features
feature.export.description: Exports features from a category in a collection to json or csv
